mapper.select: select *, case when time_limit - current_date < 0 then '予定を' || abs(time_limit - current_date) || '日経過' when time_limit - current_date = 0 then '今日の予定' when time_limit - current_date > 0 then '予定まで' || time_limit - current_date || '日' end as limit from todo_items where done_flg = 0 order by time_limit;
